Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $15000 to us due to its unique features, superior materials, and the time and expertise that went into its creation. Considering its unmatched capabilities and benefits, I believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection or operations. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase the product for $14500. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can arrange for immediate delivery and any necessary documentation. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
